ISSUE_TITLE: Top and bottom white dash line not visible for size H:546
ACTION_PERFORMED: 1. Open app. 2.Tap the Add Widget button 3. Tap on the widget, start resizing
EXPECTED_RESULT: When the widget is resized, the white dash lines along the outline are displayed
ACTUAL_RESULT: When the widget is resized to H:546, the white dashed lines at the top and bottom are not displayed
